name: Cube Jump: Silly Ways To Die
name_original: Cube Jump: Silly Ways To Die
description:
Can You help cute cube to escape from green monsters and avoid crazy obstacles like deadly saw,cannon and many more ?
Use Your hammer bomb to fight !

features:
Cute candy graphic
Relaxing piano music
Easy to learn but challenging gameplay
No blood in game so every one can enjoy it
Simple Controls
Clear Design

Thank You for playing and have a good time playing :)
